title: 以色列爆發示威抗議誤殺巴勒斯坦人及非法吞併西岸 民眾揮舞巴勒斯坦旗「巴人的命也是命」「要和平!」

replies.msg:
https://news.mingpao.com/pns/%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B/article/20200608/s00014/1591554616250/%E4%BB%A5%E8%89%B2%E5%88%97%E5%8D%83%E4%BA%BA%E7%A4%BA%E5%A8%81%E6%8A%97%E8%AD%B0%E5%90%9E%E4%BD%B5%E8%A5%BF%E5%B2%B8


【明報專訊】數千名以色列人上周六（6日）晚在特拉維夫戴着口罩和彼此保持一定距離，參與集會抗議總理內塔尼亞胡政府計劃局部吞併約旦河西岸殖民區。會場有人揮舞巴勒斯坦旗幟。

美國總統特朗普提出的和平計劃，容許以色列在美國同意下吞併多達30％西岸地區。以色列總理內塔尼亞胡準備最快7月1日將此計劃提交內閣和國會。最近一項民調顯示，近半數以色列人贊成吞併。歐洲、阿拉伯國家皆敦促以色列不要吞併，警告可能引發暴力與外交影響。

以警引發「巴人的命也是命」示威
另外，32歲自閉症巴勒斯坦男子哈拉克（Iyad Hallak）上月30日前往耶路撒冷舊城區特殊學校途中，被以色列警察誤當藏械恐怖分子槍殺，引發大型「巴勒斯坦人的命也是命」示威。內塔尼亞胡昨稱警察殺害該男子「無道理」，事屬悲劇，向死者家屬表示慰問。

以色列總理對巴人被殺表示慰問

林奠對年輕人被殘表示心涼.....


連出名冷血嘅以色列都超越埋，林鄭你真好嘢
到Israel ………
支持猶太人

replies.msg: 以色列內都有巴勒斯坦人，不過少數咁解

提提大家：

巴勒斯坦支持中國立港區國安法

Palestine on Saturday said it supports China's right to impose the full sovereignty over all its territories including Hong Kong, and maintain its territorial integrity.

"We reiterate our support to the friendly People's Republic of China's right to maintain its sovereignty, against any foreign intervention into its internal affairs and the attempts to destabilize it," the Palestinian presidency said in a statement published by the official Palestinian News and Info Agency.

Palestine values China's efforts in fighting COVID-19, said the statement, highlighting China's aid to other countries including Palestine in combating the pandemic and building a global health community for all.

Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas also appreciated the unwavering Chinese support to the people of Palestine to achieve independence and freedom, and said Palestine is keen on enhancing its relations with China to the benefit of the two peoples.

On Thursday, deputies to the 13th National People's Congress, China's national legislature, voted overwhelmingly to approve the Decision on Establishing and Improving the Legal System and Enforcement Mechanisms for the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region to Safeguard National Security.

The decision was made to safeguard national sovereignty, security and development interests, uphold and improve "one country, two systems," safeguard Hong Kong's long-term prosperity and stability, and guarantee the legitimate rights and interests of Hong Kong residents, according to the introduction of the decision.

https://www.marketwatch.com/press-release/palestine-supports-chinas-right-on-sovereignty-territorial-integrity-2020-05-30?mod=mw_more_headlines&tesla=y


香港人表示 巴勒斯坦人不是命 因為佢地根本唔會珍惜同尊重其他人條命 支持以色列管治約旦河西岸 繼續發展中東

以色列愛巴力
